price: (Rasûlullah'ın:) "Ya Rabbi! Bunlar, iman etmeyen bir kavimdir." demesini de (Allah biliyor).
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
